name: Run Fappy Run
description: Meet fappy, a direct inspiration from the very famous flappy. Help fappy get across three challenging levels filled with different kinds of obstacles and missions. Please note that this is just a prototype and I am well aware of the bugs and exploits. I will fix them as soon as possible.  More levels in development. If you like the concept of the game please make sure to let us know so that we can devote more time towards improving it. Have fun!
